Classes in mdfs.namenode.repositories used by mdfs.namenode.io
MetaDataRepositoryNode
          The node that contains all the meta-data and information neaded for a file or a dir in MDFS
 

Classes in mdfs.namenode.repositories used by mdfs.namenode.repositories
DataNodeInfoRepository
          Stores Information about available DataNodes As this is a shared recorese it is a Singelton and synchronized by ReentrantLock The lock works in the manner that if the thread holing the lock would crach, the lock will still be released
DataNodeInfoRepositoryNode
          A node that hold data regarding a DataNode
DataTypeEnum
          A enum that represtents the type of data, a file or a dir
MetaDataRepository
          A implementation of MetaDataRepository that is synchronized via ReentrantLock for allowing multiple threads.
MetaDataRepositoryNode
          The node that contains all the meta-data and information neaded for a file or a dir in MDFS
UserDataRepository
          UserDataRepository stores MDFS user data that correlates to the files, authentication and so on.
UserDataRepositoryNode
          A node that holds user data
